mapper.select: select p.per_code from sys_role r join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.sys_role_id join sys_menu_permission mp on rp.sys_menu_has_sys_permission_id = mp.id join sys_menu m on mp.sys_menu_id = m.id join sys_permission p on mp.sys_permission_id = p.id where r.role_code = #{roleCode}

select p.id,p.per_code,p.per_name,p.per_describe from sys_permission p join sys_menu_permission mp on p.id = mp.sys_permission_id join sys_menu m on mp.sys_menu_id = m.i join sys_role_permission sor on mp.id = sor.sys_menu_has_sys_permission_id join sys_role r on sor.sys_role_id = r.id join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.sys_role_id join sys_user u on ur.sys_user_id = u.id where m.id = #{menuId} and u.id = #{userId}
